about_the_game:
Oceania Book

This Oceania book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Images are of the amazing cultures from down under!

Check out this whole ocean-based continent in pixel art!

Contents

The Oceania book unlocks the following images:
  • Traditional Clothing - 46x66
  • Ostrich - 53x62
  • Koala - 65x80
  • Oceania Map - 70x70
  • Kangaroos - 73x61
  • Body Paint - 75x95
  • surf Boards - 80x150
  • Boomerang - 81x81
  • Oceanic Map - 87x132
  • Palauan Bai - 102x159
  • Tiki Masks - 106x59
  • Solomon Islands - 118x118
  • Drua - 120x120
  • Tonga Arches - 182x102
  • Uluru - 202x102
  • Instruments - 207x112
  • Lapita Gourd - 212x58
  • Solomon Islands Canoe - 263x73
  • Tapa Cloth - 299x200
  • Moai - 420x93

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Oceania Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
